select distinct aht.id_ as pkid,aht.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefKey,aht.PROC_INST_ID_ as procInstId ,aht.NAME_ as name,aht.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee,u.ORG_ID as orgId,u.USER_ID as userId from sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST aht with(nolock) left join sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tf with(nolock) on tf.INST_CODE=aht.PROC_INST_ID_ left join sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR tsi with(nolock) on tsi.CASE_CODE=tf.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.SYS_DICT d with(nolock) on d.CODE=aht.TASK_DEF_KEY_ and tsi.SRV_CODE=d.TYPE left join sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB u with(nolock) on u.USERNAME=aht.ASSIGNEE_ and u.JOB_CODE='consultant' where d.id is not null and aht.ID_ in ( select max(aht.ID_) from sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST aht with(nolock) right join sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tf with(nolock) on tf.INST_CODE=aht.PROC_INST_ID_ left join sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR tsi with(nolock) on tsi.CASE_CODE=tf.CASE_CODE left join sctrans.SYS_DICT d with(nolock) on d.CODE=aht.TASK_DEF_KEY_ and tsi.SRV_CODE=d.TYPE
where d.id is not null and TASK_DEF_KEY_ in #{df} and aht.PROC_INST_ID_=#{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by aht.TASK_DEF_KEY_ ) ;
